p: Although the goal of 1.5 Â°C is widely known, there is less understanding that meeting this challenge would not guarantee safety from a climate change perspective [ 20]. Indeed, if it were to be more widely accepted that climate change has already contributed to the Syrian war [ 21, 22], to the rise in global food prices which accompanied the 2010 drought and heatwave in Russia [ 23, 24], and the 2018 wildfire season in the Northern Hemisphere, then the threshold of danger might already be widely seen as having long been exceeded.
